Projects

Digital Globe

I worked with the Maxar Creative Team to build out the Digital Globe website. We did a full redesign with custom styles and functionality using SASS, JavaScript ES5, and some light jQuery. The website is built with a Rails back end.

Technologies used:

  • CSS
  • HTML
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
  • Ruby on Rails
  • SASS

Dr. Frank Lucido

I provided some basic tech support and web administration for Dr. Frank Lucido's WordPress installation.

Technologies used:

  • CSS
  • HTML
  • PHP
  • WordPress

Radiant Solutions

I worked with the Maxar Creative Team to build out the Radiant Solutions website. We took their placeholder site, stripped out the Bootstrap framework, and implemented all custom styles and functionality using SASS, JavaScript ES5, and some light jQuery. The website is built with a Rails back end.

Technologies used:

  • CSS
  • HTML
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
  • Ruby on Rails
  • Sass

SSDP Chapter Activity Tracker

The SSDP Chapter Activity Tracker is a custom content management system the organization uses to track and reward volunteer activity across a global network. Since 2015, I have built and maintained this system across multiple platforms - WordPress, Drupal, Flask, and Ruby on Rails.

Technologies used:

  • CSS
  • Drupal
  • DNS
  • Flask
  • Heroku
  • HTML
  • JavaScript
  • Python
  • Ruby on Rails
  • WordPress

GitHub

Shaleen Title

Shaleen Title is an Indian-American drug policy activist and attorney who currently serves as one of five commissioners on the Massachusetts Cannabis Control Commission, the agency tasked with regulating legal and medical marijuana in the commonwealth. She asked me for a classic and timeless rebuild of her website, which I completed using Jekyll and Netlify.

Technologies used:

  • Continuous deployment
  • CSS
  • DNS
  • HTML
  • Jekyll
  • Netlify
  • SASS

GitHub

The Atwater Group

The Atwater Group offers proofreading and editing services - all at affordable rates. I built a custom content management system and website for them with Ruby on Rails. The site is hosted with Heroku for continuous deployment.

Technologies used:

  • Amazon Web Services
  • Content management system
  • Continous deployment
  • CSS
  • DNS
  • Heroku
  • HTML
  • JavaScript
  • Ruby on Rails
  • SASS

GitHub

This Week in Drugs

In 2015, I co-founded the This Week in Drugs podcast. Over the course of the last three years, I've provided a variety of services to the podcast organization including audio editing, web design, web administration, and podcast publishing. In 2018 I archived the site and migrated it from a WordPress installation to a Jekyll static site for preservation, speed, and security.

Technologies used:

  • Adobe Audition
  • Amazon Web Services
  • CSS
  • DNS
  • Github Pages
  • Jekyll
  • HTML
  • PHP
  • Ruby
  • WordPress
